```{r}
#| classes: '.g-col-lg-6 .g-col-12 .g-col-md-12'
#| warning: false
#| echo: false
#| eval: true

source(here::here("inst/qmd/carousel.R"))
source(here::here("inst/qmd/get_image_uri.R"))

yaml_file <- yaml.load_file(here::here("inst/qmd/carousel.yml"))

yaml_file <- lapply(
  yaml_file,
  \(x) {
    if (file.exists(x$image)) {
      return(x)
    } else {
      x$image <- gsub(
        pattern = "../..",
        replacement = here::here(),
        x$image
      )

      x
    }
  }
)

carousel(
  "gallery-carousel",
  5000,
  yaml_file
)
```
